titleStmt.title: Unto His Grace, His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Right Honourable the Estates of Parliament the petition of John Aytoun of Kinnaldie.
titleStmt.author: Aytoun, John, of Kinaldy, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Concerns a dispute between John Aytoun of Kinaldy and Alexander Hamilton of Kinkel.
Imperfect: pages creased with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
